name: Reloading the real | 1
description: Reloading The Real takes as its starting point the psychology of waiting by appropriating the common Internet vernacular of the “loading state.” This series investigates our control upon things and our state of disconnection with our natural environment • 10% will be donated to Amazon Watch, a non-profit organization founded to protect the Amazon rainforest and advance the rights of indigenous peoples in the Amazon Basin • PNG, 2000x2000 px, 2021, edition of 10 • Contact @CampoleseCinzia
